item.title: How to Create an Xray VLESS XTLS Server on Ubuntu 20.04
item.author: amyw32@protonmail.com (Amy)
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial you’ll learn how to install Xray on an Ubuntu 20.04 server. You’ll see how to create a camouflage web server with Nginx, and then you’ll see how to install and configure Xray for the VLESS protocol with XTLS security. You’ll then test your server with the Qv2ray graphical user interface. At the end of this tutorial, you’ll have a working and tested Xray server. Prerequisites Before you begin this tutorial, you will need:
